A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: For the life of me I can't understand why critics and news media outlets would be holding up this disaster as some kind of great success. I can only imagine its to defend the over the top progressive/feminist elements of the movie. They have gone all out to defend this piece of trash film and have even said its low score is due to the \"alt-right\" leaving bad reviews... Question though\, if the progressive elements are the only thing that half the audience hates then why does Game of Thrones do so well with the general public?
